item.title: Lisk Becomes Second Most Popular Cryptocurrency Traded Against Bitcoin
item.description:
Lisk Becomes Second Most Popular Cryptocurrency Traded Against Bitcoin

Looking at the overall cryptocurrency landscape, it is becoming clear Lisk is gaining a lot of momentum in the Bitcoin trading markets. So much even that this new currency has claimed the second spot in the overall rankings. However, The DAO and MaidSafe are on its heels.

item.title: Telegram with Bitcoin integrated by StartChat Tech now available on apple app store - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Telegram with Bitcoin integrated by StartChat Tech now available on apple app store - Bitcoinist.net

StartChat combines the backend encryption of Telegram with the convenience of 2-click Bitcoin transactions and wallet currencies conversions display such as $USD, EURO, GBP, Ruble, Yen. - Apple Touch ID and Pin Code as security feature. - No wallet info needed to send bitcoin transactions to contacts.

item.title: Bitcoiners Who Use Tor - Be Warned!
item.description:
Bitcoiners Who Use Tor - Be Warned!

Bitcoiners love Tor but the FBI has "updated" Rule 41 of the internet that could blacken Tor's horizon. This means that unless Congress blocks it, using the anonymous browser could become illegal in the near future. Also read: Blockstack to Help Microsoft Develop a Global ID Platform Bitcoiners love the anonymity of Tor.

item.title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 6/02/2016
item.description:
Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 6/02/2016

Ethereum's price is fortifying above a key resistance line. A short-term flat, which is also a rebound, is coming to its conclusion. The movement which has started at $10, could become a wave of a medium-term flat. As long as that probability is there, there is a chance for a downward turn towards $10.

item.title: One Weird Trick That Brought Bitcoin to Portsmouth Yoga Studio
item.description:
One Weird Trick That Brought Bitcoin to Portsmouth Yoga Studio

When I moved to Portsmouth from San Francisco I immediately set out to find the best businesses that accept bitcoin as payment. Having spent bitcoin during previous visits to Keene, Lancaster, Manchester and Concord I knew that New Hampshire was the world capital of everyday bitcoin use.

item.description:

Ethereum price looks like setting up for a minor correction towards a major support area of $13.20 where it may find buyers. Ethereum price looks like setting up for a minor correction towards a major support area of $13.20 where it may find buyers.

item.title: Ex-S&P Capital IQ data executive joins BNC as Head of Business Development
item.description:
Ex-S&P Capital IQ data executive joins BNC as Head of Business Development

Data and Information Executive Rory Manchee, has joined Melbourne-based blockchain technology vendor BNC. The new Head of Business Development is responsible for planning and executing its Digital Assets Market-Data, business and product development efforts.

item.description:

item.title: How can blockchain be used for art works?
item.description:
How can blockchain be used for art works?

The US presidential podium, or "The Blue Goose" has always been an iconic part of each presidency. A fun fact is that a special agent is given the job of attaching the presidential seal to the podium every time the president speaks from it. Why?

item.title: How would one go about making a social network using blockchain?
item.description:
How would one go about making a social network using blockchain?

Answer: This is an impossible question to answer. Short answer is you don't. Long answer is any number of the concepts around blockchain could be used is the making of a social network. Just a login system is part of Facebook but just a part. Have you more context to share?
